author: vmassol
msg: replaced "Ant" by "Cactus" in license at top of each source file :)

author: vmassol
msg: * removed the use of a magic keyword sent back from the server side to avoid blocking on empty responses (the problem is in fact due to bugs in Sun's HttpURLConnection class - Will be fixed by using Commons HttpClient soon)
* refactored similar behaviours between Jsp Http clients and Servlet Http clients

Note: until we move to Commons HttpClient or find a solution to the broken HttpURLConnection class, the tests for the following servers will block (the tests will still run fine but each test for which the response is empty will have to time out so it will take a long time) : Tomcat 4.x, Resin 1.2, Resin 1.3. There is still a problem with Orion 1.5 and support of forward()

author: vmassol
msg: better assert text in case of error

author: vmassol
msg: * use browser-mapping tag for trying to fix broken JDK 1.3 HttpURLConnection and forcing Resin in HTTP 1.0 mode

author: vmassol
msg: * works even if log4j.jar property is not defined
